name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent v. Eliezer PEREZ, Petitioner

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent v. Eliezer PEREZ, Petitioner.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 1st day of September, 2009, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal and “Petitioner’s Application for Appointment of Counsel for Petition for Allowance of Appeal” are denied.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
982 A.2d 61
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent v. Eliezer PEREZ, Petitioner.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Sept. 1, 2009.
